connect20/plumrocket_advancedpromotions.name: connect20/Plumrocket_AdvancedPromotions

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/plumrocket_advancedpromotions.description: Advanced Promotions Magento Extension allows to significantly speed-up Admin's work with Shopping Cart Price Rules and Catalog Price Rules by adding some very useful features.
